page.title: 07INDUSTRY IN OUR AREA
page.content: Eynsham is not an industral area but there is one or two new factorys.Oxford Magnet Technology make magnets for body scaners.We interviewed the personal manager ,Marian Taylor.Almost 300 people work there.They make 120 magnets a year.They cost 0.25 million pounds each.90% are exported to the U.S.A., EUROPE and the FAR EAST.There has been 10 years research into the magnets which take 3 months to make.There are no other companies except OXFORD INSTRUMENTS but they dont make large magnets.The company has been going for 3 years.Continued on page 10
